data.text: A game played by two people, each trying to make a line of three X's or three O's in a boxlike figure with nine spaces.
data.attributionText: from The American HeritageÂ® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: A <xref>game</xref> in which two <xref>players</xref> take <xref>turns</xref> putting <xref>circles</xref> and <xref>crosses</xref> on a 3x3 <xref>grid</xref> and try to get three of the same <xref>symbols</xref> in a <xref>line</xref>
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: a game in which two players alternately put crosses and circles in one of the compartments of a square grid of nine spaces; the object is to get a row of three crosses or three circles before the opponent does
data.attributionText: from WordNet 3.0 Copyright 2006 by Princeton University. All rights reserved.
